perturbation.original_text: 1.1.3 Sponsor Identification. WCC shall ensure that all WCC public communications shall make reference to XLI products as "Light Sheets", as further defined in Attachment A [Sponsor Benefits Schedule] attached hereto and incorporated herein by reference.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1.3 Sponsor Identification. WCC shall ensure that all WCC public communications shall make reference to XLI products.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the clause 'as "Light Sheets", as further defined in Attachment A [Sponsor Benefits Schedule] attached hereto and incorporated herein by reference.', the contract no longer explicitly defines how XLI products should be referenced, or even references Attachment A which contains definitions of the 'Light Sheets.' The term "Light Sheets" is now undefined, leading to ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text: 3.1 In consideration of the rights herein granted, and in keeping with XLI's desire to utilize WCC in the   PROMOTION of its products and technology, XLI will pay WCC in accordance with Attachment B, which shall be deemed a part of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.1 In consideration of the rights herein granted, and in keeping with XLI's desire to utilize WCC in the   PROMOTION of its products and technology, XLI will pay WCC.
perturbation.explanation: The omission of 'in accordance with Attachment B, which shall be deemed a part of this Agreement' creates an issue since it describes how XLI will pay WCC, but that method is not defined. This will have uncertainty in enforcement, since the means of payment is not specifically provided for within the contract.

perturbation.original_text:
8.9 Notices. Any notice, request, instruction or other documents permitted or required to be given hereunder by any party to the other parties shall be in writing and delivered personally, by certified U.S. Mail return receipt requested, by nationally recognized reputable overnight courier, or by facsimile transmission as follows:



If to XLI: Bosch International 3753 Howard Hughes Parkway, Suite 200 Las Vegas, NV 89169 Attn: James Schramm Phone : (310) 871-4046



If to WCC: RMF Empire Inc. 2101 W. Empire Ave. Burbank, CA 91504 Attn: Ryan Friedlinghaus Phone: (818) 237-1287   A party receiving a notice delivered personally shall sign a receipt therefore. Notices by U.S. Mail or facsimile transmission shall contain an acknowledgement of receipt. A party receiving a notice by facsimile or Email shall acknowledge receipt by return facsimile or reply email within two (2) business days of receipt. A party receiving notice by U.S. Mail shall place the acknowledgment in the U.S. Mail, postage prepaid, within two (2) business days of receipt.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.9 Notices. Any notice, request, instruction or other documents permitted or required to be given hereunder by any party to the other parties shall be in writing and delivered personally, by certified U.S. Mail return receipt requested, by nationally recognized reputable overnight courier, or by facsimile transmission as follows:



If to XLI: Bosch International 3753 Howard Hughes Parkway, Suite 200 Las Vegas, NV 89169 Attn: James Schramm Phone : (310) 871-4046



If to WCC: RMF Empire Inc. 2101 W. Empire Ave. Burbank, CA 91504 Attn: Ryan Friedlinghaus Phone: (818) 237-1287
perturbation.explanation: By removing the rest of Section 8.9 regarding acknowledgement of receipts, this will create an uncertain enforcement when sending/receiving mail. While the addresses and methods of contact are still provided, the method of confirmation, and associated requirements of confirmation, are omitted, possibly leading to disputes about whether notice was properly given.
